finding.query: TanStack AI tool definition needsApproval pattern

research_notes.finding: Pattern: toolDefinition({ ... }).server(async () => { ... }) with needsApproval: true flag Key insight: Tools with needsApproval: true require user confirmation before execution UI Integration: ApprovalOverlay should appear when tool needs user approval Event Flow: User sees ToolCallBadge ‚Üí ApprovalOverlay ‚Üí User clicks Accept/Reject ‚Üí Tool executes

Pattern: Dialog.Root ‚Üí Dialog.Portal ‚Üí Dialog.Overlay ‚Üí Dialog.Content ‚Üí Dialog.Close Key insight: Use Dialog.Content with forceMount for controlled overlay behavior Accessibility: Proper ARIA labels, focus management, and escape key handling Composability: Can wrap Dialog.Content with custom approval UI components

finding.query: Radix UI Dialog content props and event handlers

research_notes.finding: Pattern: Dialog.Content with onOpenAutoFocus, onCloseAutoFocus, onEscapeKeyDown handlers Key insight: Use onInteractOutside to prevent accidental dismissal for critical approvals Focus Management: Dialog automatically manages focus, but can be customized Animation: Supports forceMount for integration with animation libraries
